Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Lost Tales of Greece | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – The Lost Tales of Greece]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'Upon encountering Timotheos training on the cliffs, Kassandra challenged the ex-warrior to a friendly sparring match.'

General_Description: '''Wounds of Days Gone By''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met with [[Timotheos]], who was training on a cliff near the [[Isle of Salamis]].
Section_Dialogue:
Timotheos saw Kassandra approaching.

*'''Timotheos:''' ''Kassandra! There you are.''

Kassandra walked closer.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''Am I interrupting?''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''This is where I used to practice sparring with [[Diokles|my father]]. After he retired to the fishing business, he lost interest. But I kept up the practice on my own.''
<tabber>
|-|Flirt - You shouldn't train alone.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Doesn't training on your own get lonely?''
|-|Training alone isn't a challenge.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Sparring without a partner isn't a real challenge.''
</tabber>

*'''Timotheos:''' ''Are you trying to goad me into a sparring match, [[mercenary]]?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I might be interested in some friendly competition.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''I... don't think that's a good idea.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Are you scared, [[Athens|Athenian]]?''
*'''Timotheos:'''  ''I just... Fine. Let's spar.''

(If players choose "Let's start.")

*'''Kassandra:''' ''Let's see what you've got.''

During the fight, Timotheos got in a few punches.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''That all you've got?''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''Ha! I'm just getting started.''

Timotheos began taunting Kassandra.

*'''Timotheos:''' ''Come on, mercenary! Keep up!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Please! You're the one slowing down.''

Kassandra landed some punches herself.

*'''Timotheos:''' ''Filthy [[Sparta]]ns!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Timotheos, are you OK?''

Timotheos was forced to his knee.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''You fought well, Athenian. Timotheos?''

Timotheos quickly charged her.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''Timotheos, what are you doing?''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''I—No. Stop. Stop.''

He grabbed his head.

*'''Timotheos:''' ''No! No! Stay back! Get away from me!''
<tabber>
|-|I'll stay back. (calming)=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll stay back. I promise.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''I—don't know what I'll do if you get too close.''
|-|Let me help. (aggravating)=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm not going to hurt you. Let me—''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''Don't you get it? I might hurt you if you don't stay away!''
</tabber>

*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're not going to hurt me, Timotheos.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''You don't... you don't know that. I don't know if I could stop myself right now.''
<tabber>
|-|You couldn't hurt me. (aggravating)=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Even if you did try to hurt me, I'm more than capable of fending you off.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''That's not... You're underestimating what I'll do when this happens.''
|-|You won't hurt me. (calming)=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I know you're stronger than whatever this is.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''When I get like this... If I lose control for even a second, the terrible things I see myself doing...''
</tabber>

*'''Kassandra:''' ''Timotheos...''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''No, no, no. Stop. Stop!''
<tabber>
|-|Breathe. (calming)=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Just breathe.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''I'm OK. I'm OK. Thank you.''
|-|Control yourself. (aggravating)=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Just calm down.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''Like it's that fucking easy!''
</tabber>

*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're safe, Timotheos. I promise.''

(If Kassandra was not able to calm Timotheos down)

*'''Timotheos:''' ''I need to be alone right now. I - I'm sorry.''

Timotheos left a puzzled Kassandra behind.
(If Kassandra was able to calm Timotheos down)

*'''Timotheos:''' ''I feel... better. Thank you. Would you mind... staying with me for a moment?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Whatever you need.''

After a while, they sat and watched the sunset.

*'''Timotheos:''' ''Father handled coming back from [[Peloponnesian War|the war]] so much better than I did. Any loud noise or unexpected hand on my shoulder, and my heart bursts from my chest. But he never flinched.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Did you tell him?''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''I couldn't bear to tell father the reason I was discharged, let alone this. I wanted to make him proud.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Why were you discharged?''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''I... lost control in a battle and killed one of my comrades. My commander and I were close, so he discharged me with mania instead of charging me with treason. When I returned from the war, father never asked why. I don't know if he suspected or...''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Maybe he was hiding his struggles the way you hid yours.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''If that's true, he was strong enough to hide it from everyone. I'm too weak to even hide it from you.''
<tabber>
|-|You're a survivor.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Pain doesn't make you weak. Timotheos. You're a survivor.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''When the battle hasn't been won, is there really honor in coming back alive?''
She stood up, and lowered her hand to him.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's going to be all right, Timotheos.''
He took her hand, and stood up. Joining her in watching the sunset.
*'''Timotheos:''' ''For the first time, I think it might be.''
|-|Flirt-You're strong.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Timotheos, you're a strong person. Anyone can see that.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''You think I'm strong?''
{{#tag:tabber|
You're tough.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You know you're tough''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''Still nice to hear you say it.''
{{!}}-{{!}}
Stop fishing for compliments.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Maybe if you stopped brooding for a second, you'd see it, too.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''My father just died.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I... You're right. Sorry''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''It's... fine.''
{{!}}-{{!}}
You care about people.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Anyone who cares for people the way you do is strong, Timotheos.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''You think i'm caring.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Of course. You care for Lykinos... and others.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''Others?''
}}
She stood up, and lowered her hand to him.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're going to be all right, Timotheos.''
He took her hand, and stood up.
*'''Timotheos:''' ''Thank you. And... under normal circumstances, I would never tell you to stay away from me.''
{{#tag:tabber|
Flirt - Let's get closer.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We could get closer now.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''What are we waiting for?''
The two kissed and spent the night together.
{{!}}-{{!}}
Let's stay where we are.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I think we're close enough for now.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''All right. this is nice, too.''
Kassandra turned around he joined her in watching the sunset.
}}
|-|Everyone carries scars.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''War isn't easy, Timotheos. Everyone comes back with wounds that never heal.''
*'''Timotheos:''' ''Physical scars fade. I'm not sure the ones I have ever will.''
She stood up, and lowered her hand to him.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's going to be all right, Timotheos.''
He took her hand, and stood up. Joining her in watching the sunset.
*'''Timotheos:''' ''For the first time, I think it might be.''
</tabber>
Regardless, Kassandra thought she should pay the two brothers a visit.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''I should check in on Timotheos und Lykinos at their father's house.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra and Timotheos sparred, after which it turns out he was suffering from {{Wiki|post-traumatic stress disorder}} due to the war.
Section_Trivia: *To calm down Thimotheos, players should choose 1 or 2 of the "calming" responses for the first two choices and "Breathe" for the third one, otherwise their attempts will prove futile.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
